episodes.title: Surviving the Shadows: Escaping a Cult with Isabella Young
episodes.description:
Become a YouTube Member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCepkkmrkd_3G5Ick719HcXA/join

In this gripping episode of the Greyhorn Pagans podcast, host StijnFawkes welcomes Isabella Young, who shares her harrowing journey of escaping a cult. 
Isabella opens up about the psychological and emotional challenges she faced, the manipulation and control exerted by the cult leader, and the personal tragedy that ultimately led to her liberation. 
This episode delves into the complexities of healing, the power of self-discovery, and the importance of staying connected to nature and one's true self. Join us for a raw and enlightening conversation that sheds light on the dark world of cults and the resilience of the human spirit.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
About Isabella:
"Seventeen years ago, I escaped from a messianic cult after my son was murdered to prevent the cult leader (my ex-husband) from being exposed as a pedophile, rapist, and conman. Once I escaped, I focused on spending time in Nature, expanding my consciousness, healing emotional wounds, learning about cults and mind control, and freeing my mind from cult programming."
